name: Unfinished Gordok Business
tooltip:
Unfinished Gordok BusinessLevel 60

Find the Gauntlet of Gordok Might and return it to Captain Kromcrush in Dire Maul.

According to Kromcrush, the "old timey story" says that Tortheldrin - a "creepy" elf who called himself a prince - stole it from one of the Gordok kings.

Requirements:
- Gauntlet of Gordok Might
